# AXcent Dance Zurich

> Premier Bachata and Latin dance studio in Zurich. Join our community for classes, workshops, and social events.

[Full Website Content](https://axcentdance.com/llms-full.txt)

## Core Business Pages offer classes for all levels, from absolute beginners to advanced dancers, as well as private lessons, wedding dance choreography, and event hosting.

## Key Information

- **Location**: Hermetschloostrasse 73, 8048 Zurich Altstetten (2 min from Tram 2 / Bus 31).
- **Instructors**: Ale & Xidan (Founders).
- **Team**: We are a team of **international teachers** bringing global dance expertise to Zurich.
- **Languages**: Classes are taught in English and German.
- **Levels**: Absolute Beginner to Advanced/Masterclass.

## Core Business Pages

- [Home](https://axcentdance.com/) - Overview, trial registration, and latest news.
- [Schedule](https://axcentdance.com/schedule) - Weekly timetable and pricing options.
- [Events](https://axcentdance.com/events) - Workshops, bootcamps, and social dance nights.
- [About Us](https://axcentdance.com/about) - Meet Ale & Xidan and our philosophy.
- [Contact](https://axcentdance.com/contact) - Location map and contact form.
- [Private Lessons](https://axcentdance.com/private-lessons) - 1-on-1 coaching for rapid improvement.
- [Wedding Dance](https://axcentdance.com/wedding-dance) - Custom choreography for wedding couples.
- [Room Rental](https://axcentdance.com/room-rental) - Studio space available for rent.

## Classes & Guides

- [Bachata Beginner](https://axcentdance.com/class-bachata-beginner-0) - Course details for new dancers.
- [Bachata Sensual](https://axcentdance.com/class-bachata-sensual-foundation) - Foundation and technique for Sensual style.
- [Lady Styling](https://axcentdance.com/class-bachata-lady-styling) - Solo styling classes.
- [Beginner Guide](https://axcentdance.com/beginner-guide) - First class tips, what to wear, and shoe guide.
- [Dance Etiquette](https://axcentdance.com/etiquette) - Rules and guidelines for social dancing.
- [Education](https://axcentdance.com/education) - History, styles, musicality, and glossary.
- [Corporate Events](https://axcentdance.com/corporate-events) - Company parties and team building.
- [Collaborations](https://axcentdance.com/collaborations) - Partner projects and guest artists.
- [FAQ](https://axcentdance.com/faq) - Frequently Asked Questions.
- [Gallery](https://axcentdance.com/gallery) - Photos and videos from our events.
- [Milano Congress 2026](https://axcentdance.com/Milano-Sensual-Congress-2026) - Jan 2026 details.
- [Milano Congress Spring 2026](https://axcentdance.com/Milano-Sensual-Congress-Spring-2026) - Spring edition details.

## Blog

- [Blog](https://axcentdance.com/blog) - Latest news, music tips, and dance advice.

## Deutsch (German Version)

Die deutsche Version der Website ist unter [axcentdance.com/de/](https://axcentdance.com/de/) verfügbar.

### Core Business-Seiten (DE)
- [Home (DE)](https://axcentdance.com/de/) - Übersicht, Anmeldung zur Probelektion und aktuelle News.
- [Stundenplan](https://axcentdance.com/de/schedule) - Wöchentlicher Kursplan und Preisoptionen.
- [Events](https://axcentdance.com/de/events) - Workshops, Bootcamps und Social Dance Nächte.
- [Über uns](https://axcentdance.com/de/about) - Lernen Sie Ale & Xidan und unsere Philosophie kennen.
- [Kontakt](https://axcentdance.com/de/contact) - Standortkarte und Kontaktformular.
- [Privatstunden](https://axcentdance.com/de/private-lessons) - 1-zu-1 Coaching für schnelle Fortschritte.
- [Hochzeitstanz](https://axcentdance.com/de/wedding-dance) - Individuelle Choreografie für Hochzeitspaare.
- [Raumvermietung](https://axcentdance.com/de/room-rental) - Studioräume zur Miete verfügbar.

### Kurse & Guides (DE)
- [Anfänger Guide](https://axcentdance.com/de/beginner-guide) - Tipps für die erste Stunde, Kleidung und Schuh-Guide.
- [Tanzetikette](https://axcentdance.com/de/etiquette) - Regeln und Richtlinien für Social Dancing.
- [Ausbildung](https://axcentdance.com/de/education) - Geschichte, Stile, Musikalität und Glossar.
- [Was ist Bachata?](https://axcentdance.com/de/guide-bachata) - Ursprung, Geschichte und Stile des Tanzes.
- [Social Dancing Guide](https://axcentdance.com/de/guide-social-dancing) - Einführung in die Welt des Social Dancing.
- [Firmenevents](https://axcentdance.com/de/corporate-events) - Firmenfeiern und Teambuilding.
- [FAQ](https://axcentdance.com/de/faq) - Häufig gestellte Fragen (DE).
- [Galerie](https://axcentdance.com/de/gallery) - Fotos und Videos von unseren Events.
- [Anmeldung](https://axcentdance.com/de/registration) - Anmeldung für Kurse und Workshops.
- [Milano Congress 2026](https://axcentdance.com/de/Milano-Sensual-Congress-2026) - Details zum Event im Januar 2026.
- [Milano Congress Spring 2026](https://axcentdance.com/de/Milano-Sensual-Congress-Spring-2026) - Details zur Spring Edition.

### Blog (DE)
- [Blog (DE)](https://axcentdance.com/de/blog) - Aktuelle News, Musiktipps und Tanzberatung auf Deutsch.
